thread.section_title: HablaMexico.com Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of HablaMexico.com | hablamexico.com
thread.title: Francis C

author: Francis C
title: Francis C
text: I've only had positive experiences with HablaMexico. They are feasible to work with and the one time I had to call in to ask about my account, someone answered fast and I could understand perfectly what they were saying. I hate going to the store and having to buy 2 or 5 dollar cards. HablaMexico lets me pay with Paypal which is my preferred method of paying. Thanks!
